original_query: "Find 'best restaurants in Riyad' and list the top 5 with their ratings"

perception.result_requirement: List of top 5 restaurants in Riyadh with their ratings.
perception.reasoning: The query requires finding restaurants in a specific location and their ratings, which necessitates using a tool to access and retrieve this information. It is not achievable with the information already present.
perception.local_reasoning: The initial query needs external information to be answered.

plan_text: Step 0: Search DuckDuckGo for 'best restaurants in Riyadh' to get a list of restaurants and their ratings.
Step 1: Extract the top 5 restaurants and their ratings from the search results.
Step 2: Present the extracted information in a list.

steps.description: Search DuckDuckGo for 'best restaurants in Riyadh' to get a list of restaurants and their ratings.

tool_arguments.code:
result = duckduckgo_search_results("best restaurants in Riyadh", 5)
return result

execution_result.result:
Found 5 search results:

1. The 72 best restaurants in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia: sort by cuisine ...

Based on 12 months of anonymous reviews conducted all over the Saudi capital, this list serves as a tried-and-tasted indicator of which eateries are really worth your hard-earned riyals.    URL: https://www.cntravellerme.com/story/best-restaurants-in-riyadh
   Summary: Address: Four Seasons HotelRiyadhat Kingdom Centre, Kingdom Centre, Olaya Street, Al Olaya. Carbone.Riyadhis the first global outpost for this New York celebrity favourite, where stars from David Beckham to Kim Kardashian come for cuisine that pays homage to the great Italian-Americanrestaurantsof the mid-20th century. The original in ...

4. Top 10 Restaurants In Riyadh | Where & What To Eat - CuddlyNest.com
   URL: https://www.cuddlynest.com/blog/best-restaurants-in-riyadh/
   Summary: Azure is a Spanishrestaurantinthe Hyatt Regency OlayaRiyadhHotel and is known to be one of thebestrestaurantsinRiyadh. Thisrestaurantmay be fine dining but it celebrates home-style southern Spanish cooking accompanied by breathtaking views of the city.

5. Reservations Radar: 85 of the best restaurants in Riyadh right now
   URL: https://www.factmagazines.com/saudi-arabia/riyadh-saudi-arabia/food-riyadh-saudi-arabia/the-best-restaurants-in-riyadh
